summary: Versatile software engineer with expertise in MERN stack, React Native, and Django, specializing in building scalable web and mobile applications. Passionate about AI/ML development, with hands-on experience in deep learning, predictive modeling, and data-driven decision-making. Skilled in integrating machine learning solutions into real-world applications, optimizing performance, and creating user-friendly dashboards. Proficient in Docker, cloud deployment, and data pipelines to ensure seamless automation and scalability. Adept at handling large datasets, implementing robust backend systems, and crafting intuitive UI/UX experiences. Always eager to explore emerging technologies and push the boundaries of innovation.
exp1_desc: Worked a part time job as a react native and django full stack developers, my work was to rework and refactor old deprecated code bases and add functionalities to projects
exp2_desc: Worked on a project to predict the stock prices of a company using machine learning and deep learning models, the project was a part of my university course
